name: Beelonging
description:
Playing in Fullscreen Mode is highly recommended!

After getting a call from your bee buddy telling you that your hive is under attack by the evil bear, you take on an adventure to get home and save your friends. On your way there, you approach several different obstacles and enemies, which you can only overcome by working together with the rest of your swarm.

Beelonging is an uplifting-shoot em up game with happy music, colourful environments and fun challenges not only for kids, but for the whole family.

Credits:

Lina Femling, Producer
Jan Plähn, Lead Programmer
Natali Arvidsson, Lead Artist 
Moa Bruus, Art/Lead Sound
Maximilian Kassander, Lead Design
